entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Chatham-Kent
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:19 PM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -10.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Chatham-Kent 11:00 PM EST Saturday 24 December 2022
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -10.7°C
Pressure: 100.8 kPa
Visibility: 14.5 km
Humidity: 80 %
Wind Chill: -22
Dewpoint: -13.5°C
Wind: W 42 km/h gust 55 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Saturday night: Flurries. Temperature steady near minus 6.
entry.summary: Flurries. Local blowing snow. Local amount 5 cm. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 60. Temperature steady near minus 6. Wind chill near minus 16. Forecast issued 6:25 PM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 9. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Local blowing snow. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature steady near minus 9. Wind chill near minus 18. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 6:25 PM EST Saturday 24 December 2022
